column4: at 2.50 pm there was a traffic accident between the car and the train.------The white Nissan KPS-0674 (right steering wheel)  was driving north-south
column5: the coal train was traveling to Kampong Trach District
column6: Kampot Province. After hitting the truck the train did not stop.------The unidentified truck driver is said to be seriously injured.------There was another serious accident ------on the line in Kampot at 5.30------
column7: seriously injuring a Kampot Police Traffic Inspector. ------SWIFT
